column4: anyone here using brtfs? Fresh install and chose to use brtfs for / ...is it more or is it almost painfully slow? Using apt to install stuff takes SOOOOO long.
btrfs performs well, but unfortunately the fsck isn't quite ready yet
so if your filesystem becomes corrupted, you will be in for some waiting

ah. Well..i may just reinstall tomorrow with ext4 then. I thought I'd give brtfs a shot since it seems to be all the rage now..but this is getting annoying. Install a few dependencies for compiling xbmc has taken around 30-35 mins so far...like 15 seconds to dl the debs and now its SLOWLY installing them all.
